name: ssdif2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: sstrd(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c2, c3), cdif(c0, c3), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c3), cdif(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c3), cdif(c2, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c3), cdif(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c3), cdif(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

comment: If ` A ` is contained in ` B ` and ` C ` is contained in ` D ` , then ` ( A \ D ) ` is contained in ` ( B \ C ) ` . Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
